sentences.english: When Victor's mother died from anthrax, Fredy came along and adopted him.
sentences.chinese: 維克多的媽媽得炭疽病死後，佛雷迪就收養了他。

sentences.english: The study on age-related disease resistance of mango leaves to Colletotrichum gloeosporioides Penz.
sentences.chinese: 研究了芒果葉片生化特性與炭疽病發生之間的關係。

sentences.english: Persimmon anthracnose is one of the major diseases attacking persimmon trees in Shangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 柿炭疽病是陝西商洛柿樹的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: The anthracnose infected soil also had severe acid rot.
sentences.chinese: 炭疽病嚴重的地塊酸腐病也嚴重。

sentences.english: Extensive replication in the blood is generally what kills patients who succumb to anthrax .
sentences.chinese: 血液內大量繁殖的細菌通常是炭疽病致死的主因。

sentences.english: Tolerant to fusarium wilt and anthracnose.

sentences.chinese: 同時表示，他在炭疽病侵襲的時候在實驗室呆到很晚。

sentences.english: Stylo anthracnose and Current Research Progresses on Anthracnose Resistance Breeding.
sentences.chinese: 柱花草炭疽病及其抗病育種進展。

sentences.english: Terrorists sent letters around the world with the anthrax virus in the envelopes.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子把投放了炭疽病病毒的郵件寄往了各地。

sentences.english: Yam anthracnose is an important disease for the crop Diascorea opposite Thunb.
sentences.chinese: 山藥炭疽病是山藥上的重要病害。

definition: boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
